CustomField.formula: if(ISBLANK(MailingStreet), "" , MailingStreet & br()) & if(ISBLANK(MailingCity), "" , MailingCity& ", " ) & if(ISBLANK(MailingState), "" , MailingState& " " ) & if(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode), "" , MailingPostalCode & br()) & if(ISBLANK(MailingCountry), "" , MailingCountry)
CustomField.label: Mailing Address
